name: BanTheKlan
description:
BanTheKlan is a small game about freeing your Ferris Wheel from members of the KuKluxKlan while keeping the tolerant citizens aboard. The Klan-Men and Klan-Women will reveal themselves by taking their hoods on and off, but you should not get fooled by the hats of other people. Use your mouse to poke the KKK off their ride before the short time runs out, or you will lose as you let hate aboard. The prototype mixes elements of aiming and timing with the flavor of classic hidden object games.

The game is still on prototype level and might receive future updates, though it is playable now.

BanTheKlan was created by David Mathews (Visual Development, Game Design, Sound) and Basil Sutter (Game Design, Programming, Sound) during five days of a Game Jam at Fantoche 2017 in Baden, Switzerland. 


David Mathews website: http://davidm.co

Basil Sutter’s website: http://basilsutter.tumblr.com
